com.mesosphere.sdk.specification

Class DefaultServiceSpec.Generator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.specification.DefaultServiceSpec.Generator
  • Enclosing class:
    DefaultServiceSpec

    public static final class DefaultServiceSpec.Generator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a ServiceSpec from a given YAML definition in the form of a RawServiceSpec.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DefaultServiceSpec build() 
      DefaultServiceSpec.Generator setAllPodsEnv(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Assigns an environment variable to be included in all service tasks.
      DefaultServiceSpec.Generator setConfigTemplateReader(YAMLToInternalMappers.ConfigTemplateReader configTemplateReader)
      Assigns a custom YAMLToInternalMappers.ConfigTemplateReader implementation for reading config file templates.
      DefaultServiceSpec.Generator setMultiServiceFrameworkConfig(FrameworkConfig multiServiceFrameworkConfig)
      Assigns a custom framework config.
      DefaultServiceSpec.Generator setPodEnv(java.lang.String podType, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Assigns an environment variable to be included in tasks for the specified pod type.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setAllPodsEnv

        public DefaultServiceSpec.Generator setAllPodsEnv(java.lang.String key,
                                                  java.lang.String value)
        Assigns an environment variable to be included in all service tasks. Note that this may be overridden via TASKCFG_* scheduler environment variables at runtime, and by pod-specific settings provided via setPodEnv(String, String, String).

      • setPodEnv

        public DefaultServiceSpec.Generator setPodEnv(java.lang.String podType,
                                              java.lang.String key,
                                              java.lang.String value)
        Assigns an environment variable to be included in tasks for the specified pod type. For example, all tasks running inside of "index" pods. Note that this may be overridden via TASKCFG_* scheduler environment variables at runtime.

      • setMultiServiceFrameworkConfig

        public DefaultServiceSpec.Generator setMultiServiceFrameworkConfig(FrameworkConfig multiServiceFrameworkConfig)
        Assigns a custom framework config. In the default single-service case, this is derived from the RawServiceSpec provided in the constructor.

      • setConfigTemplateReader

        public DefaultServiceSpec.Generator setConfigTemplateReader(YAMLToInternalMappers.ConfigTemplateReader configTemplateReader)
        Assigns a custom YAMLToInternalMappers.ConfigTemplateReader implementation for reading config file templates. This is exposed to support mocking in tests.

      • build

        public DefaultServiceSpec build()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
